description: Significant events from the first 18 months of America's participation in WWII - the mobilisation of industry, training of volunteers, and the worldwide deployment of American troops. Includes footage of the naval war in the Pacific, the Japanese threat to Australia and the battles of the Coral Sea, Midway, Guadalcanal, Solomons and Papua.
